document_data.name: ''Brazier of Commanding Fire Elementals''
document_data.mainbody: A '''''brazier of commanding fire elementals''''' was a powerful [[magic item]] that could summon and control [[fire elemental]]s.
document_data.Description: ''Braziers of commanding fire elementals'' were small [[gold]]en containers that were filled with smoldering [[coal]]s. In order to activate the brazier's powers, the owner needed to simply stir the embers.
document_data.Uses: This item could only be used by [[flame mage]]s and [[holy slayer]]s of the [[Flamedeath Fellowship]].
document_data.History:
A ''brazier of commanding fire elementals'' was located within the [[Mosque of Kossuth (Krak al-Niraan)|Mosque of Kossuth]] in the fortress of [[Krak al-Niraan]] in the [[Weeping Desert]] in [[1367 DR]].{{AQ-time}}

''Braziers of commanding fire elementals'' sometimes could be found in the rich markets of [[Hillsfar]] in the [[Moonsea]] region.
